sourcesContent:
// the graph configuration, you only need to pass down properties
// that you want to override, otherwise default ones will be used

const {width, height } = getWindowDimensions();

export const colors = {
		node: {  
				default: '#3D3C3A', // oil black
				done: '',
				highlight: '#E41B17', // red
				highlightStroke: '#27332F', // red
				selected: '',
				onPath: '',

		},
		link:{
				default: '',
				onPath: '',
				antonim: '',
		},
		font: {
			default: "black",
		}
}

const  myConfig = {
		"automaticRearrangeAfterDropNode": false,
		"collapsible": false,
		"directed": false,
		"focusAnimationDuration": 0.75,
		"backgroundColor": "black",
		"focusZoom": 1,
		"height": height - 65,
		"width": width,
		"highlightDegree": 100,
		"highlightOpacity": 0.5,
		"linkHighlightBehavior": true,
		"maxZoom": 10,
		"minZoom": 0.1,
		"nodeHighlightBehavior": true,
		"panAndZoom": false,
		"staticGraph": false,
		"staticGraphWithDragAndDrop": false,
		"d3": {
				"alphaTarget": 0.3,
				"gravity": -140,
				"linkLength": 3,
				"linkStrength": 2,
				"disableLinkForce": false
		},
		"node": {
				"color": colors.node.default,
				"fontColor": colors.font.default,
				"fontSize": 8,
				"fontWeight": "bold",
				"highlightColor": colors.node.highlight,
				"highlightFontSize": 8,
				"highlightFontWeight": "bold",
				"highlightStrokeColor": "black",
				"highlightStrokeWidth": colors.node.highlightStroke,
				"labelProperty": "id",
				"mouseCursor": "pointer",
				"opacity": 1,
				"renderLabel": true,
				"size": 210,
				"strokeColor": "#C6DEFF",
				"strokeWidth": "1.6",
				"svg": "",
				"symbolType": "circle"
		},
		"link": {
				"color": "#d3d3d3",
				"fontColor": "black",
				"fontSize": 8,
				"fontWeight": "normal",
				"highlightColor": "#E41B17",
				"highlightFontSize": 8,
				"highlightFontWeight": "normal",
				"labelProperty": "label",
				"mouseCursor": "pointer",
				"opacity": 0.7,
				"renderLabel": true,
				"semanticStrokeWidth": false,
				"strokeWidth": 1.5,
				"markerHeight": 6,
				"markerWidth": 6
		}
};



function getWindowDimensions() {
		const { innerWidth: width, innerHeight: height  } = window;
		return { width, height };
}

export default myConfig;
